paper_abstract: We establish some stability results concerning the following functional inequalities parallel to f(x) + f(y) + f(z) parallel to <=parallel to f(x + y = z)parallel to and parallel to f(x) + f(y) + 2f(z) parallel to <=parallel to 2f ( x+y/2 + z)parallel to in the setting of latticetic random phi-normed spaces.
paper_title: ON STABILITY OF FUNCTIONAL INEQUALITIES AT RANDOM LATTICE phi-NORMED SPACES
